The Battle of G체stow, also known as the Battle of Tornow took place during the Pomeranian War in the Seven Years' War fought between Prussia and Sweden near the village G체stow in Germany on 18 November 1758. The battle ended with a Prussian victory.
References
*S채we, Teofron, ''Sweden's participation in the Seven Years' War Years 1757-1762, p. 221, Stockholm, 1915
